title: Cyberczar

content: Saw this somewhere and wonder what they're up to. What do you think?https://easygold.io/

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Hard to know what they are up to with the limited info available, but I have seen so many Gold best token try to rise and then die out before, so If I were you. I would avoid them.There is another side which hard similar info but is now offline. Are they the same or one is you shared is an impersonator. comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Cyberczar on May 15, 2023, 02:02:06 PMSaw this somewhere and wonder what they're up to. What do you think?https://easygold.io/It's fake and another money-grabbing project if you scroll down you'll see that they want to make themselves credible by posting images of these reputable sites but they are not clickable just a baseless claim to bait people to invest, they don't have an announcement here but if they do they will be busted.
